Frequently asked questions

What is included in a bond clean?
A typical bond clean includes kitchen and bathroom deep clean, floors, windows inside, walls spot-clean, oven and rangehood, and all fixtures. Carpet steam cleaning and pest treatment are usually add-ons.
How much does bond cleaning cost in Brisbane?
Bond cleaning costs depend on bedrooms, bathrooms, property type, condition and add-ons. Use this calculator for an estimate. Final quotes vary by provider and inspection.
Do I need a bond clean before moving out?
Most tenancy agreements require the property to be returned in the same condition as at the start. A professional end-of-lease clean helps maximise your bond refund.
Is this quote guaranteed?
This is an estimate only. For a confirmed quote, contact a local bond cleaning provider. Final price may vary with condition and extra services.
